language.entry: GENERAL
TOWN
QUEST
A contextual help screen is available through the menu
[LONG TOUCH] hero portrait to view hero character sheet
[TAP] order button over roster to sort heroes
Sort twice to invert order
[TOUCH BEHIND THE PARTY] - Move Left
[TOUCH AHEAD THE PARTY] - Move right
[LONG TOUCH] hero to view hero character sheet
[TOUCH] the light indicator to use torch.
[SWIPE DOWN] the light indicator to lower light.
[TOUCH] to dismiss hero word balloons.
[TOUCH] inventory to sell back
[LONG TOUCH] to select, [TAP] cross to sell.
[LONG TOUCH] on this item to discard it.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on meal options to choose how much to eat. You are limited by how much food you have in inventory.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH]{colour_end} on their skill to use it. Some skills require a target to be selected.
When done spending ACTION POINTS, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on REST to finish Camping.
On hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a valid combat skill and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a target to act.

Each skill has different requirements for where the hero needs to be standing and what enemies they can target. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the skill to see the requirements.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on enemies to see stats and chances to hit/damage/crit with currently selected skill.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on Anti-Venom or Bandages in inventory to heal BLIGHT or BLEED on the current hero.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the retreat icon (looks like an "X") to attempt to retreat from the combat.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero to see their detailed character sheet.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH AHEAD THE PARTY]{colour_end} to walk forward, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH BEHIND THE PARTY] {colour_end} to walk backward.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero's move skill to change their party position.
Entering Doors: When in front of a door, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on it
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PINCH]{colour_end} to zoom map and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} to pan map
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on objects to interact with them. The selected hero will perform the interaction.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero to see their detailed character sheet.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the INVENTORY tab to examine supplies.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the PERSONALITY tab to see the current hero's quirks and afflictions.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the retreat icon (looks like an "X") to abandon the quest.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end}on a torch to use it from inventory.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a room in the map to begin moving to that room.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero to select them.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero's move skill to change their party position.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on firewood in inventory (if you have any) to start CAMPING.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH AND KEEP]{colour_end} over the torch meter to see current light level and gameplay effects.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the retreat icon (looks like an "X") to abandon the quest.
While interacting with an object: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} an inventory item to apply it to the object. Some items will yield positive effects.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PINCH]{colour_end} to zoom map and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} to pan map
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero to see their detailed character sheet.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end}on a torch to use it from inventory.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero in the roster to inspect their detailed character sheet. They can be renamed or dismissed permanently from there.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on buildings to use them to interact with your heroes.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the red X below to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not recover the money spent.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on upgrades to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Blacksmith before purchasing some hero upgrades.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero in your roster to load them into the Survivalist and see their camping skill upgrade options.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on skills or upgrades to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Survivalist before purchasing some hero upgrades.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on combat skills or combat skill upgrades to purchase them. You may need to upgrade the Guild before purchasing some hero upgrades.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on available items to purchase them.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} items in the shop to purchase them for the expedition.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on available quests to inspect them.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on heroes or {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG] {colour_end} them into the party slots to form an adventuring party.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} PROVISION when ready to proceed.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the red X below to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not recover the money spent.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on new heroes to inspect them.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the + icon to see upgrade options for this building.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the red X below to eject the hero from the building activity prematurely. You will not recover the money spent.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH]{colour_end} the screen to Continue
[SWIPE DOWN] to reduce torch

Your hero is {colour_start|pop_text_poison}blighted{colour_end}! If you wish, you can use {colour_start|notable}anti-venom{colour_end} from inventory to neutralize it. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}anti-venom{colour_end} while it's the injured hero's turn.

Your hero is {colour_start|pop_text_bleed}bleeding{colour_end}! If you wish, you can use a {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end} from inventory to stop the flow. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}bandage{colour_end} while it's the injured hero's turn.

This quest involves {colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end}, and Camping requires {colour_start|notable}firewood{colour_end}. Firewood is {colour_start|notable}given automatically{colour_end} to you on appropriate quests. {colour_start|notable}Camping{colour_end} gives heroes a chance to {colour_start|notable}recuperate while in the dungeon{colour_end}. When you are wounded or {colour_start|stressNOT1}stressed{colour_end} and wish to camp, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH]{colour_end} on the firewood in your inventory.

Combat is {colour_start|notable}turn-based{colour_end}. On your hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} a skill icon and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on a highlighted target. If you can't select a particular skill, it's because that hero needs to be {colour_start|notable}standing in a different spot{colour_end} or there are {colour_start|notable}no valid targets{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} the skill to see the requirements.

While exploring, you will often find {colour_start|notable}interactive objects{colour_end}. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH] {colour_end} to investigate them. Take a look at this tent...

Scouted {colour_start|trap}traps{colour_end} will be {colour_start|notable}visible on the ground{colour_end} as you approach them. Select a hero and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on the {colour_start|trap}trap{colour_end} to attempt to {colour_start|notable}disarm it{colour_end}. Some heroes are better than others at disarming.

There isn't much more you can do in town right now. It's time to EMBARK on a quest!
Tap on the {colour_start|notable}[EMBARK]{colour_end} button at the bottom of the screen!

While in a {colour_start|notable}hallway{colour_end},{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH AHEAD THE PARTY]{colour_end} to move forward, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result} [TOUCH BEHIND THE PARTY]{colour_end} to move back.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[LONG TOUCH]{colour_end} on a hero's {colour_start|notable}image or portrait{colour_end} at any time to bring up a detailed panel showing all of the hero's {colour_start|notable}quirks{colour_end}, {colour_start|notable}skills {colour_end}, and {colour_start|notable}resistances{colour_end}

Each item, if you take it, will occupy space in your inventory.
{colour_start|notable}Hold your finger on{colour_end} items to show details about them. This works in your inventory, too!
(Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}the top right cross icon{colour_end} to close this window.)
Heroes can only have {colour_start|notable}4 Camping skills active{colour_end} at a time. Toggle the skills on and off by touching on them.

You are currently in a {colour_start|notable}room{colour_end}. To move forth, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on {colour_start|notable}another room{colour_end} on the {colour_start|notable}map display{colour_end}. This will take you to the {colour_start|notable}connecting hallway{colour_end}.

On any screen in the game, touch the {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[HELP BUTTON]{colour_end} in the pause menu to see contextual help for controls in that mode. Try it while in town, exploring, fighting, camping and more.

After you've completed the requirements of a quest, you have the option to {colour_start|notable}return to town{colour_end} at any time-- just {colour_start|notable}[TOUCH] the crest{colour_end}. You don't need to return to the starting room of the dungeon to exit.

This is where you select a quest and form an adventuring party of four heroes to embark on it.
{colour_start|notable}[TOUCH]{colour_end} on quests to see their details.
{colour_start|notable}[DRAG]{colour_end} heroes into slots at the bottom of the screen to form your party and default party order.

A critical scouting success will sometimes reveal a {colour_start|notable}Secret Room{colour_end}! Advance to the tile marked with a star, and touch to enter. Fabulous wealth and riches await those equipped with a {colour_start|notable}key{colour_end}...

While you're here, spend some of your starting heirlooms on {colour_start|notable}upgrading the Stagecoach Network{colour_end}. This will increase the number of heroes available here in the future.
To upgrade, touch the {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[+]{colour_end} symbol on the left, and then touch the upgrade.

The {colour_start|notable}light{colour_end} is fading! The current {colour_start|notable}torch level greatly affects many mechanics{colour_end} in the game. The darker it gets, the harder things get but the better the rewards. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH] {colour_end} on a torch from inventory to boost the light back up.
To enter a {colour_start|notable}door{colour_end}, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCH]{colour_end} when standing in front of it.

Un écran d'aide contextuelle est disponible via le menu.
[TOUCHEZ LONGUEMENT] le portrait d'un héros pour afficher sa fiche de personnage.
[TOUCHEZ] les boutons de tri au dessus de la liste de recrues pour trier les héros.
Appuyez deux fois pour inverser l'ordre.
[TOUCHER DERRIÈRE LE GROUPE] : Déplacement vers la gauche
[TOUCHER DEVANT LE GROUPE] : Déplacement vers la droite
[TOUCHEZ LONGUEMENT] un héros pour afficher sa fiche de personnage.
[TOUCHEZ] l'indicateur de lumière pour utiliser une torche.
[GLISSEZ VERS LE BAS] sur l'indicateur de lumière pour la réduire.
[TOUCHER] pour supprimer les bulles des héros.
[TOUCHER] l'inventaire pour revendre.
[TOUCHER LONGUEMENT] pour sélectionner, [TOUCHER] la croix pour vendre.
[TOUCHER LONGUEMENT] l'objet pour le jeter.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} les options de repas pour choisir la quantité de nourriture à consommer. Vos choix sont limités par la nourriture présente dans votre inventaire.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} un héros puis {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} sa compétence pour l'utiliser. Certaines compétences doivent être ciblées.
Une fois les POINTS D'ACTION dépensés, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} REPOS pour mettre fin au campement.

Lors du tour d'un héros, agissez en {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHANT]{colour_end} une compétence de combat puis en {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHANT]{colour_end} une cible.

Chaque compétence présente diverses restrictions quant au positionnement du héros et au ennemis pouvant être ciblés. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} la compétence pour afficher ces restrictions.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ LONGUEMENT]{colour_end} un ennemi pour voir des statistiques et les chances de réussite/dégâts/coup critique de la compétence sélectionnée.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} les antidotes et les bandages dans l'inventaire pour soigner les INFECTIONS et les SAIGNEMENTS.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} l'icône de repli (ressemble à un "X") pour tenter de fuir le combat.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ LONGUEMENT]{colour_end} un personnage pour afficher sa fiche de personnage détaillée.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ DEVANT LE GROUPE]{colour_end} pour avancer, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ DERRIÈRE LE GROUPE]{colour_end} pour reculer.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} la compétence de déplacement d'un héros pour modifier sa position dans le groupe.
Ouvrir les portes : En face d'une porte, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ-LA]{colour_end} pour l'ouvrir.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[PINCEZ]{colour_end} pour zoomer sur la carte et {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[FAITES GLISSER]{colour_end} pour la faire défiler.
Pour que votre héros interagisse avec un objet, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ-LE]{colour_end}.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} l'icône de repli (ressemble à un "X") pour abandonner la quête.

En interagissant avec un objet : {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} un article de l'inventaire pour l'appliquer sur l'objet. Certaines interactions produisent des effets positifs.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ LONGUEMENT]{colour_end} un héros de la liste des recrues pour examiner sa feuille de personnage détaillée. Ils peuvent être renommés ou renvoyés de manière permanente.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} les bâtiments pour les utiliser avec vos héros.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} l’icône + pour voir les options d'amélioration du bâtiment.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[TOUCHEZ]{colour_end} une amélioration ou une compétence pour l'acheter. Il se peut qu'il soit nécessaire d'améliorer l'experte en survie avant d'acheter des améliorations pour vos héros.

Votre héros souffre d'une {colour_start|pop_text_poison}infection{colour_end} ! Möchtest du iCloud für deine Speicherdateien aktivieren?
iCloud-Synchronisierung aktivieren

Bei aktivierter iCloud werden Speicherdaten ständig auf den iCloud-Servern gespeichert. Dies verhindert den Verlust von Daten beim Deinstallieren der Anwendung und erlaubt es dir, dein Spiel auf einem anderen Gerät fortzusetzen.

WARNUNG: Du bist derzeit offline. Falls du in letzter Zeit auf keinem anderen Gerät gespielt hast, wähle „iCloud aktivieren“. Gesicherte Dateien werden automatisch hochgeladen, sobald die Verbindung wiederhergestellt wird. Falls du zuletzt auf einem anderen Gerät gespielt hast und mit deinem Fortschritt fortfahren möchtest, wähle „iCloud deaktivieren“ und verlasse die Anwendung. Verbinde dein iPad mit dem Internet, bevor du sie erneut startest und iCloud wieder aktivierst.

¿Quieres activar iCloud para guardar archivos?
Activar sincronización con iCloud

Al activar iCloud, se almacenarán datos de guardado de forma constante en los servidores iCloud. Esto sirve para evitar la pérdida de datos al desinstalar la aplicación y además te permite retomar tu progreso en otros dispositivos.

Hemos detectado que tienes archivos guardados con fecha de %s en tu iCloud. ¿Quieres descargarlos o prefieres subir tus partidas locales?

ATENCIÓN: actualmente no estás conectado a internet. En caso de no haber jugado recientemente en otro dispositivo, selecciona la opción «Activar iCloud». Se subirán automáticamente las copias de seguridad tan pronto como se recupere la conexión. Si la última vez que jugaste fue en otro dispositivo y quieres retomar tu progreso en el juego, selecciona «Desactivar iCloud» y sal de la aplicación. Conecta tu iPad a internet antes de iniciar el juego y vuelve a activar el servicio iCloud.

Com o iCloud ativado, os dados serão constantemente copiados para os servidores do iCloud. Isso evita a perda de dados na desinstalação do aplicativo e permite que você continue seu jogo em um outro dispositivo.

Czy chcesz aktywować usługę iCloud dla danych zapisu?
Włącz synchronizację z usługą iCloud

Aktywacja usługi iCloud sprawi, że kopie bezpieczeństwa danych zapisu rozgrywki będą stale zapisywane na serwerach usługi iCloud. Rozwiązanie to zabezpiecza twoje postępy w przypadku odinstalowania aplikacji oraz umożliwia rozgrywkę na różnych urządzeniach.

Zauważyliśmy, że na twoim dysku internetowym w usłudze iCloud są już dane zapisu datowane na %s. Chcesz je pobrać, czy wolisz zastąpić je lokalnymi danymi zapisu?

OSTRZEŻENIE: Nie podłączono do sieci. Jeśli nie korzystano ostatnio z gry na żadnym innym urządzeniu, wybierz opcję „Aktywacja usługi iCloud”. Kopie zapasowe zostaną automatycznie przesłane na serwer po wznowieniu połączenia z siecią. Jeśli jednak używano gry na innym urządzeniu i chcesz kontynuować rozgrywkę, wybierz opcję „Dezaktywacja usługi iCloud” i wyjdź z aplikacji. Połącz swój iPad z Internetem, a następnie uruchom aplikację ponownie i aktywuj usługę iCloud.

Vuoi attivare iCloud per i tuoi salvataggi?
Abilita sincronizzazione con iCloud

Quando iCloud è attivo, verrà sempre effettuato un backup dei salvataggi sui server di iCloud. In questo modo, anche se disinstalli l'app, non perderai nessun dato e potrai perfino continuare la partita su un altro dispositivo.
